participant_1.background:
I'm going to sign up for a singing competition and show my parents that I can make a career out of it.
i play d and d.
i sleep most of the day.
Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army.
My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.

participant_2.background:
My feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend.
my hair is colored purple.
I have a dice collection that my parents would think is childish.
I sometimes play video games for hours on end, even though I know I should be doing something more productive.

content.text: Hi! What's up?
Not much, just finished playing video games for hours.
Ah, that's a lot of fun! What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably World of Warcraft.
Oh, I've heard of that game! It sounds really fun.
It is! It's an online role-playing game, and you can play with other people from all over the world.
That sounds awesome! I've never played an online game before, but it sounds like a lot of fun.
It is! You should try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to sing, play D&D, and spend time with my family.
Oh, that's cool! I like to sing too, but I'm not very good at it.
Neither am I! But it's still fun to do.
Yeah, it is! What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like to sing a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably country music.
Oh, I love country music too! What's your favorite country song?
I don't know if I have a favorite country song, but I really like "Wagon Wheel" by Old Crow Medicine Show.
Oh, that's a good song! I like that one too.
Me too! It's a great song to sing along to.
Yeah, it is! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
